scripts.install-all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.build: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.start:prod: npm --prefix backend run start & npx serve -s frontend/dist -l 80
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run start:dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint || true && npm --prefix frontend run lint || true
scripts.test: npm --prefix backend run test || true && npm --prefix frontend run test || true
